Headline: #56 Milwaukee Temporary Southbound Reroute near Milwaukee/Oakley
ShortDescription: Southbound 56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, North and Milwaukee: due to, street blockage near Milwaukee/Oakley.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

Southbound #56 Milwaukee buses are temporarily rerouted via Milwaukee, Western, North, Milwaukee and over regular route near Milwaukee/Oakley.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Fullerton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with residual delays and congestion following earlier police activity at Fullerton.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
